front.title: DHCP option for MIP type Decision

abstract.t: Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol is used as the trigger of network to distinguish if a MS need the proxy mip capability.But a MS maybe has the MIP capability.We need a flag to know if a MS need or require Proxy MIP capability.This document explains we can define a flag in dhcp option to state that a MS wish or doesn't wish to have the Proxy MIP capability.
